mapper.select: SELECT a.job_id jobId, a.title, a.job_type jobType, a.request_body requestBody, a.response_body responseBody, a.`status`, b.user_name userName, CONVERT (a.create_time, CHAR) createTime, CONVERT (a.complate_time, CHAR) complateTime FROM job_mate_mation a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON a.create_id = b.user_id WHERE a.big_type = #{bigType} AND a.type = '1' AND a.create_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job_mate_mation (title, job_type, big_type, type, request_body, `status`, parent_id, create_id, create_ip, create_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{jobType}, #{bigType}, #{type}, #{requestBody}, #{status}, #{parentId}, #{createId}, #{createIp}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.job_id jobId, a.title, a.job_type jobType, a.type, a.request_body requestBody, a.response_body responseBody, a.parent_id parentId, a.`status`, a.create_id createId FROM job_mate_mation a WHERE a.job_id = #{jobId}

SELECT a.job_id jobId, a.title, a.job_type jobType, a.type, a.request_body requestBody, a.response_body responseBody, a.parent_id parentId a.`status` FROM job_mate_mation a WHERE a.parent_id = #{jobId} AND a.type = '2' AND a.status IN(1, 2)

SELECT a.job_id jobId, a.title, a.job_type jobType, a.type, a.request_body requestBody, a.response_body responseBody, a.parent_id parentId a.`status` FROM job_mate_mation a WHERE a.parent_id = #{jobId} AND a.type = '2' AND a.status = '3'
